channel.title: Searching the Web :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Video Script So in this video, we’re going to reiterate a little bit what we talked about with our relational database, right? Because the whole point of the relational database is that we can store lots of information in a very structured way that is easily searchable. That’s really important in today’s world, because we have the World Wide Web, right, the internet, it’s huge. Now that we know how to store data in a reasonable fashion, we have to talk about where most of the data in the world is actually stored.
